scripts.write-translations:all: npm_execpath run write-translations --locale ar && npm_execpath run write-translations --locale bn && npm_execpath run write-translations --locale cs && npm_execpath run write-translations --locale da && npm_execpath run write-translations --locale de && npm_execpath run write-translations --locale el && npm_execpath run write-translations --locale en && npm_execpath run write-translations --locale es && npm_execpath run write-translations --locale fi && npm_execpath run write-translations --locale fr && npm_execpath run write-translations --locale he && npm_execpath run write-translations --locale hi && npm_execpath run write-translations --locale hu && npm_execpath run write-translations --locale id && npm_execpath run write-translations --locale it && npm_execpath run write-translations --locale ja && npm_execpath run write-translations --locale ko && npm_execpath run write-translations --locale nl && npm_execpath run write-translations --locale nb && npm_execpath run write-translations --locale pl && npm_execpath run write-translations --locale pt && npm_execpath run write-translations --locale ro && npm_execpath run write-translations --locale ru && npm_execpath run write-translations --locale sk && npm_execpath run write-translations --locale sv && npm_execpath run write-translations --locale ta && npm_execpath run write-translations --locale th && npm_execpath run write-translations --locale tr && npm_execpath run write-translations --locale zh-Hans && npm_execpath run write-translations --locale zh-Hant
scripts.worker: tsc --project scripts --outDir scripts/dist && node -r dotenv/config --experimental-modules scripts/dist/worker.mjs
scripts.worker:test: tsc --project scripts --outDir scripts/dist && node -r dotenv/config --experimental-modules scripts/dist/worker-test.mjs
scripts.translate:cli: tsc --project scripts --outDir scripts/dist && node -r dotenv/config --experimental-modules scripts/dist/translate-cli.mjs
